item.title: Migrating my Blog from Ghost to Hugo
item.description: For Canada Day, I decided to migrate my blog from Ghost to Hugo. I have sort-of reasons that I'll discuss here but ultimately, I was just bored of my current setup and figured I could save a few bucks a month in hosting fees by using github to host my static content.
